amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to reduce by $11,404,000 funding for the Office of the Chief Economist to FY16 levels directs the difference to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Biggs.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
